name: Our Walls' Story
description:
Flora and melody are in a relationship and embark on the great adventure of living together. An emotional roller coaster daily awaits them, with these surprises and twists and turns. Our Walls’ Story is designed to be played on mobile, we consider this app as an interactive short film.

____________________________________________________________

This game has been made in three months by a team of 5 students from the Cnam-Enjmin:


2D Artist • BLANC Aliénor
Pitcher, programmer, UI, VFX and Lights • MOREAUX RémiSound Designer  • IMBERT Thomas
Music Composer •  PERRET Marion
Producer • SEBBAG Julien
